basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/Cisco%20ISE/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ The [Cisco ISE](https://www.cisco.com/c/en_in/products/security/identity-services-engine/index.html) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Cisco ISE’s NAC logs into Microsoft Sentinel, providing insight into network threats and vulnerabilities. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Agent-based log collection (Syslog) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-syslog) **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 1, **Workbooks:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 10, **Hunting Queries:** 10, **Custom Azure Logic Apps Connectors:** 1, **Playbooks:** 3 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for Cisco ISE. You can get Cisco ISE Syslog data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.
The solution installs a parser that transforms ingested data. The transformed logs can be accessed using the CiscoISEEvent Kusto Function alias.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This solution installs workbook(s) to help you gain insights into the telemetry collected in Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.

options.text: Sets the time name for analysis
This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.

elements.name: analytic1
elements.label: CiscoISE - ISE administrator password has been reset

options.text: Detects when the ISE administrator password has been reset.

elements.name: analytic2
elements.label: CiscoISE - Attempt to delete local store logs

options.text: Detects when attempt to delete local store logs failed.

elements.name: analytic3
elements.label: CiscoISE - Backup failed

options.text: Detects when backup activity failed.

elements.name: analytic4
elements.label: CiscoISE - Certificate has expired

options.text: Detects certificate expiration.

elements.name: analytic5
elements.label: CiscoISE -  Command executed with the highest privileges from new IP

options.text: Detects command execution with PrivilegeLevel - 15 from new source.

elements.name: analytic6
elements.label: CiscoISE - Command executed with the highest privileges by new user

options.text: Detects command execution with PrivilegeLevel - 15 by user for wich there was no such activity detected earlier.

elements.name: analytic7

options.text: Detects when device changes IP address in last 24 hours.

This solution installs the Playbook templates to help implement your Security Orchestration, Automation and Response (SOAR) operations. After installing the solution, these will be deployed under Playbook Templates in the Automation blade in Microsoft Sentinel. They can be configured and managed from the Manage solution view in Content Hub.
